   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Exoppy documentation
===================

Exoppy is a python package to generate synthetic data for exoplanets. Currently it can generate synthetic lightcurve dataset for some given parameters.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   lightcurve.rst
